inputs.inputName: Download CSV file - will be over max filesize

schemaDescription: file_url: string: the URL of the file to download
max_filesize_in_megabytes: integer: maximum file size in MB to download
target_folder: string: folder to download the file
metadata.actionSignature: action/args: "file_url: str, max_filesize_in_megabytes: int=100, target_folder: str=''"
